description: Client side event fired when a user clicks any Call-to-Action (CTA) in the app (e.g., "Start Free Trial").

accessibilityTag.description: The accessibility tag of the CTA.

category.description: The event category (used to group related events).

checksRemaining.description: Number of surf or spot checks remaining at time of click.

emailState.description: Whether or not the user's email address is verified.

funnel.description: The name or type of funnel the CTA belongs to.

hasCam.description: Whether or not the page where the CTA was clicked has a camera.

location.description: Where the event fired on our application.

mode.description: The mode of the player (if applicable) when the CTA was clicked.

orientation.description: The orientation of the screen when the user clicked the CTA.

screenName.description: The screen name where the user clicked the CTA.

spotReliveRating.description: The rating of the surfline session.

tags.description: The tags associated with the CTA.
